api-wrappers.name: .NET Core Nuget Package Wrapper
api-wrappers.description: C# NuGet package that wraps XML APIs

api-wrappers.name: Go wrapper
api-wrappers.description: Wrapper written in Go for easy use of Veracode APIs

api-wrappers.name: veracode-api (Ruby)
api-wrappers.description: Ruby Wrapper for the Veracode API.

api-wrappers.name: veracode-api-clients
api-wrappers.description: Client code using the Veracode REST and XML APIs. Includes handlers for Veracode Dynamic Analysis scanning.

api-wrappers.name: veracode-api-py
api-wrappers.description: Python helper library for working with the Veracode APIs. Handles retries, pagination, and other features of the modern Veracode REST APIs.
